meanings.definition: Publications that are issued three times a week.
meanings.sent1: The library receives the triweeklies every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the triweeklies to stay updated on local news.
meanings.sent3: The triweeklies always seem to arrive right before I run out of reading material.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to reading the triweeklies religiously is admirable.
meanings.sent5: The colorful covers of the triweeklies brighten up my mailbox.

meanings.definition: The act of publishing something three times a week.
meanings.sent1: The triweeklies of the school newspaper keep students informed regularly.
meanings.sent2: The editor's job involves overseeing the triweeklies' production and distribution.
meanings.sent3: The sudden popularity of the triweeklies caught the staff by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The triweeklies' impact on the community cannot be underestimated.
meanings.sent5: The editor-in-chief takes pride in the quality of the triweeklies.
